triennial.descr: full parashah with Ten Commandments every year

triennial-alt.descr: triennial divisions with Ten Commandments in years two and three

triennial.descr: with the Ten Commandments every year and the Sh'ma in years two and three

triennial-alt.descr: with the Ten Commandments in year two and the Sh'ma in year three

triennial.descr: When these Sidrot are not combined, they should each be read in their entirety.
When these Sidrot are not combined, they should each be read in their entirety.
